CustomField.description: Enable this setting to have the deployment invocation sent to Prodly support and skip the actual deployment. Allows support to debug errors by reproducing the deployment in a local development environment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to have the deployment invocation sent to Prodly support and skip the actual deployment. Allows support to debug errors by reproducing the deployment in a local development environment.
CustomField.label: Debug Deployment
